Issue.summary: Channel configuration (add org) fails via node sdk
Issue.description: DEBU dc1 Preprocessing CONFIG_UPDATE_ _2018-01-10 10:51:09.201 UTC orderer/configupdate Process -> DEBU dc2 Processing channel reconfiguration request for channel testchainid_ _2018-01-10 10:51:09.201 UTC orderer/common/broadcast Handle -> WARN dc3 Rejecting CONFIG_UPDATE because: {color:#ff0000}Error authorizing update: unexpected EOF{color}_ _2018-01-10 10:51:09.201 UTC orderer/main func1 -> DEBU dc4 Closing Broadcast stream_ _***********************************************************************************************_ Attached my node.js code and add org json file (org3MSP).
